claims.claim: Arts and creative workshops in prison contribute to personal growth and rehabilitation.
claims.quote: they run a facilitate, I should say create writing workshops, theater workshops. We got a photography workshop now at one institution, music workshops

claims.claim: Collaborative efforts between universities and correctional facilities can lead to successful educational and creative programs for inmates.
claims.quote: So Pcap is the University of Michigan. They go inside, they perform, they run a facilitate, I should say create writing workshops, theater workshops.

claims.claim: Organizations dedicated to change within the carceral system are able to deliver impactful programs against odds.
claims.quote: And every time, so many other orgs I know who put together programming who try to make a change, they ass delivers because they care about delivering.

claims.claim: Inmate participation in creative and expressive programs leads to successful final performances and projects.
claims.quote: And at the end of each semester there's a final performance. And that is the culmination of that semester.
